thread.section_title: Jingshan Garden Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Not 4 Star!!
thread.title_full: Not 4 Star!! - Review of Jingshan Garden Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Clairecookson
title: Not 4 Star!!
text: Baffled how this gets a 4 star rating? More like a 2 star. Didn't feel safe arriving down dim small street, carrying suitcase ( taxi can not fit down the street) first introduction was a rat running across the road! Reception tiny, but staff nice. Rooms very basic but clean, no bar, no refreshments, no room service. If I had booked a 2 star hotel then maybe I would of been happy but I was expecting a 4 star! Would not stay again I like a bit more luxury, expensive for what you get.
